text: 5.11 Mat 18.17, Lom 16.17, 2 Te 3.6, Tat 3.10, 2 Jo 10 Takaw yad agɨnek ak pen jɨj anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Binɨb Klays binɨb ne nab okok mɨdɨl mam ay chɨn apɨm okok, kɨli tap tɨmel anɨgenɨgabal, takaw dayday ma agɨl ayɨp jɨmñɨl ma yenɨmɨb. Binɨb kɨli chɨn Klays binɨb ne mɨdobun apal anɨb okok, kɨli bin si bɨ si gɨl, tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl nɨŋɨd, tap yepɨs sɨbog ñɨl, binɨb agjuwɨl takaw tɨmel agɨl, ñɨg kɨles ñɨbɨl sawl lɨl, tap si dɨl, tap tɨmel anɨb okok genɨgabal, takaw dayday ma agɨl ayɨp jɨmñɨl ma yenɨmɨb. Pen kɨli ayɨp tap ma yɨbɨl ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb.
